::Bobertron/CyberShark::

    "CyberShark, we are attacking the Iron Fist. The Destrocons have already 
engaged them," Bobertron said to CyberShark. "I need you to use your cloaking 
device and get as close as you can and do as much damage as possible to the 
hull, so we can get inside."
    "Understood. I will go immediately," CyberShark said. He started to run 
to the entrance of the base. Once getting there he transformed and flew off. 
    Nearing the Iron Fist he cloaked, he hoped their scanners were at least a 
few years old. (His cloaking technology is very new.) He got really close and 
started to fire from his primary blaster.
(Can I post damage for a ship? Or is that moding? If not then) The plasma 
grenades found their mark and started to tear the hull.
(If so then) The plasma grenades found their mark, CyberShark flew to another 
spot on the ship and started to shoot again. He hoped that the grenades would 
do at least a little damage.
